content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: Hello Nesibe, it's great to meet you! So, what are your thoughts on the rental price for this apartment?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: I think the apartment is in a good location, and it has a good view. I also think that it's a very nice apartment with a modern interior. However, I'm not sure about the rental price. I was wondering if you have any suggestions on what a fair price would be.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Great, I appreciate your interest in the apartment! Based on its location and modern interior, I would suggest a rental price of €800 per month. This price is competitive in the area and takes into account the value of the apartment. Is this price within your budget?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: I'm sorry, I have to check with my client. Could you give me some time to think about it?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Of course, I understand. Please take all the time you need to make your decision. Let me know if you have any questions or need any additional information.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi
